Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(byte[], byte[], byte[], String, Configuration, boolean, Durability, WAL, byte[]...)
    use #createLocalHRegion(TableName, byte[], byte[], boolean, Durability, WAL, byte[]...)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(HRegionInfo, HTableDescriptor)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(HRegionInfo, TableDescriptor)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(HRegionInfo, HTableDescriptor, WAL)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(HRegionInfo, TableDescriptor, WAL)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(HTableDescriptor, byte[], byte[])
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createLocalHRegion(TableDescriptor, byte[], byte[])
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createMultiRegionsInMeta(Configuration, HTableDescriptor, byte[][])
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createMultiRegionsInMeta(Configuration, TableDescriptor, byte[][])
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createPreSplitLoadTestTable(Configuration, HTableDescriptor, HColumnDescriptor)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createPreSplitLoadTestTable(Configuration, TableDescriptor, ColumnFamilyDescriptor)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createPreSplitLoadTestTable(Configuration, HTableDescriptor, HColumnDescriptor[], int)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createPreSplitLoadTestTable(Configuration, TableDescriptor, ColumnFamilyDescriptor[], int)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createPreSplitLoadTestTable(Configuration, HTableDescriptor, HColumnDescriptor, int)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createPreSplitLoadTestTable(Configuration, TableDescriptor, ColumnFamilyDescriptor, int)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createRegionAndWAL(HRegionInfo, Path, Configuration, HTableDescriptor)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createRegionAndWAL(HRegionInfo, Path, Configuration, TableDescriptor)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createRegionAndWAL(HRegionInfo, Path, Configuration, HTableDescriptor, boolean)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createRegionAndWAL(HRegionInfo, Path, Configuration, TableDescriptor, boolean)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTable(HTableDescriptor, byte[][])
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createTable(TableDescriptor, byte[][])
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTable(HTableDescriptor, byte[][], byte[][], Configuration)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createTable(TableDescriptor, byte[][], byte[][], Configuration)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTable(HTableDescriptor, byte[][], Configuration)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createTable(TableDescriptor, byte[][], Configuration)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(String)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTableDescriptor(String, int, int, int, KeepDeletedCells)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.createTestRegion(String, HColumnDescriptor)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.createTestRegion(String, ColumnFamilyDescriptor)
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.getHBaseAdmin()
    Since 2.0. Will be removed in 3.0. Use HBaseTestingUtility.getAdmin() instead.
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseTestingUtility.modifyTableSync(Admin, HTableDescriptor)
    since 2.0 version and will be removed in 3.0 version. use HBaseTestingUtility.modifyTableSync(Admin, TableDescriptor)
